title: Ticket #7234: Better support for flocked environments for condor_status and condor_q
description:
Create or better-adapt Condor tools to flocked environments (in particular, condor_status and condor_analyze) [Duncan and James will write user questions in English, Todd will create tickets] 

What resources are available that can/could run my job?
Is/are my job(s) running?
Why is/are my job(s) not running?
Show me all my currently-running jobs and where they’re running.
Where did my finished -or- idle job last run?
Why did my job(s) fail?
Why did my job stop running after it started?
